name: A GRAVE DISTURBANCE
description:
A Grave Disturbance sees you, a lone police officer, investigating reports of noise and stench at the local graveyard. Expecting a simple case of vandalism or grave robbery, you are instead met with hordes of the undead. Do you have what it takes to survive?

CONTROLS
  • Left Mouse Button / CTRL - Shoot
  • Mouse - Aim
  • W, A, S, D - Move Around
WHERE CREDIT IS DUE

Please refer to the documentation in the game folder for a list of all external assets used.
